node.title: Christian Porter's resignation removes roadblock for PM but Liberals need strong replacement, analyst warns
node.alt: The shop front window of Christian Porter's electorate office
node.description: With morale low, the Liberals may struggle to find a quality replacement candidate for Christian Porter in the northern Perth seat of Pearce, warns William Bowe, even though a potential distraction for the election campaign is gone.
node.content:
["Christian Porter's retirement from federal politics will remove a potential distraction for the Morrison government as it prepares for next year's election, according to a political analyst, as the WA Liberal Party paid tribute to the MP's \"immense contribution\".", "Mr Porter, the member for the West Australian seat of Pearce, on Perth's northern outskirts,\u00a0announced his resignation yesterday, saying he wanted to spend more time with his\u00a0family.", "Political analyst William Bowe, who runs the \"Poll Bludger\"\u00a0website, said Mr Porter's decision was expected.", "\"He's always been a person with big ambitions in life,\" he said.", "\"I imagine that having to fight tooth and nail to hold on to what looks like a dicey marginal seat wasn't a very attractive proposition for him.\"", "", "
Christian Porter has announced he's quitting federal politics
", "Mr Bowe said it removed a potential distraction from the Morrison campaign.", "\"I don't think it's a game-changer in terms of the election, but this whole issue that has been surrounding them in terms of, in particular, their appeal to women voters, there's that sort of whole cascade of issues that the Morrison government has been facing.", "\"And I guess this removes one of those roadblocks without removing the issue altogether.\"", "
Pearce 'typical\u00a0middle Australia'
", "Mr Porter\u00a0had\u00a0been expected to quit politics\u00a0after a year in which he moved from one of the highest positions of power in parliament to the backbench.", "Earlier this year, historical allegations of rape were levelled at him in a letter sent to Prime Minister Scott Morrison.", "He strenuously denied the allegations\u00a0and pursued defamation action against the ABC, which led to Mr Morrison appointing him as the industry, science and technology portfolio in a reshuffle\u00a0on the basis that he could not remain as\u00a0attorney-general while trying to sue the public broadcaster.", "Mr Porter quit the front bench after declaring he had accepted funds from\u00a0anonymous donors to cover\u00a0some of the legal fees in his defamation action against the ABC, action he eventually dropped.", "Mr Bowe said while Labor would believe Mr Porter's seat of Pearce was now even more winnable, it was representative of middle Australia\u00a0and\u00a0the kind of electorate likely to be held by the party that won government.", "", "
William Bowe says the Liberal Party may have trouble attracting a quality candidate for Pearce.(ABC NEWS; Jessica Warriner)
", "\"It has always been a Liberal seat since it was created,\" he said.", "\"It has been changing over the years, in particular, it's changed in the redistribution.", "\"It has traditionally been a mixed urban/rural seat. It is now exclusively an urban seat and as a result of that, it has lost some pretty rock-solid conservative territory in the Avon Valley.\u00a0", "\"Labor views Western Australia as its golden opportunity.\u00a0After decades of underperformance at federal level in Western Australia, Labor now has its wind in its sails because of what the state government has done to improve its branding here.\"", "", "
The Pearce electorate sits\u00a0in the suburban mortgage belt stretching all the way to Two Rocks, about 60km north of Perth.(ABC News: Graeme Powell)
", "Mr Bowe said\u00a0the \"mortgage payers and tradies\" of Pearce may be attracted to Mr Morrison's persona, but the WA Liberals would need to find a good candidate in difficult circumstances.", "\"There is a lot of lead in the Liberal Party's saddlebags at the moment, morale in the party is not high,\" he said.", "\"There will be a sense that they will struggle to win the seat and that might limit the quality of the talent pool available to them.\"", "
Porter 'served with distinction': Liberals
", "In a statement, the WA Liberal Party said that in 14 years of public life, Mr Porter had \"served with distinction and dedication, whilst also delivering for the communities he represented\".", "It said\u00a0he \"very ably served\" as WA treasurer and attorney-general, before moving to federal politics and serving in federal cabinet under two Liberal Prime Ministers.", "The party said it would advise members in the near future of the process for selecting a candidate for Pearce.\u00a0", "Labor candidate Tracey Roberts said she was not surprised Mr Porter was calling it a day.", "", "
Wanneroo Mayor Tracey Roberts is the Labor\u00a0candidate for Pearce at the upcoming election.(ABC News: Marcus Alborn)
", "\"This has been something that's been anticipated for a while,\" she said.", "\"I've been representing that community as Mayor of the City of Wanneroo for 10 years, and I'll continue to represent that community.", "\"I'll be running my own race, always have and always will.\""]
